channel.title: Your views on
channel.description: Your views on "gay". Most people use the word "gay" to define a person who has intercourse with the same sex. Other people use the word to define something bad that has happened. Ex1: John is so gay. Ex2: Wow, we can't even run, this is so gay. But what does "gay" really mean? Well I've learned in school that "gay" really means "good", or "happy". Well does that mean you have to be "gay" to be happy? What are your views on this? -No Homophobic commments, we're all human.

item.title: Your views on
item.dc:creator: @bumr055 bumr055
item.description:
@bumr055 wrote:

gay means homo. if you say “oh this is gay” it is just using the word weird and is not the same meaning. when you say “i want to fuck her” it is inproper use of the word because fuck does not mean sex.

so the word gay was made to explain or make fuck of homos. and i think saying gay means happy is just a stareotype that gay people are always happy.

edit: i take that back… i remember a long time ago(wasint alive) but the word gay used to be used for saying happy. but now the word gay has evolved into homo. but fuck still does not properly mean sex.

edit2: i think when back in the day you used the word gay you didnt direct it to anyones like “im having a gay time” so i think gay was kindove universol.

Read full topic

item.title: Your views on
item.dc:creator: @briatwork briatwork
item.description:
@briatwork wrote:

Kyte, my statement may have been childish, but it was as funny as hell. This topic on the other hand is the most ridiculous I have ever seen on any forum. Come on, a ‘serious’ discussion on the meanings of the word gay, you need to get out more (or should I say you need to come out) tee hee.

Your views on “gay”. Most people use the word “gay” to define a person who has intercourse with the same sex. Other people use the word to define something bad that has happened. Ex1: John is so gay. Ex2: Wow, we can’t even run, this is so gay.
But what does “gay” really mean? Well I’ve learned in school that “gay” really means “good”, or “happy”. Well does that mean you have to be “gay” to be happy? What are your views on this?
